arts.ttl: Augsburg stun Gladbach with clinical display as Alexis Claude-Maurice shines on debut
arts.sum: Despite the visitors' mounting pressure, Augsburg's defence held firm, with Onyeka and Kristijan Jakić providing crucial protection in midfield. As the match kicked off, it was clear that Gladbach were intent on controlling the tempo.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Gladbach preview: Can die Fohlen claim back-to-back victories?
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach will attempt to claim a second straight win when they travel to the WWK Arena for Friday’s clash with Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
